title: Travelers Among the Mountains and Streams

content.question: In Travelers among Mountains and Streams, Fan Kuan makes the few human and animal figures very small in comparison to the massive mountains in order to remind viewers that

choices.label: people should choose to live simply
people are insignificant in relation to nature
the bond between people and animals is important
people should not attempt to scale the heights of a mountain

content.answer: people are insignificant in relation to nature

unit.text: 8: South, East, and Southeast Asia, 300 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 8.2: Purpose and Audience in South, East, and Southeast Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
